translation.en: To walk, I think we'll go on low setting. We may end up surveying both, but...
translation.ja: まずは徒歩の設定で

translation.en: [Dennis] This site is a forgotten place.
translation.ja: ここは忘れられた場所

translation.en: But it should be a warning to us all.
translation.ja: しかし我々に警告する

translation.en: [man] We'll identify the anomalies and mark those out.
translation.ja: 異常があれば印をする

translation.en: So you're trying to narrow the focus of the radar pulse, is that it?
translation.ja: レーダーの波動を見る？

translation.en: [man] Yeah, we're looking for a change in the density of the soil.
translation.ja: 土壌(どじょう)密度の変化を探知する

translation.en: [man] There are some anomalies sort of popping up.
translation.ja: たまに異常が見られる

translation.en: This is a pretty strong one here, there's one there.
translation.ja: ここは特に顕著(けんちょ)だ

translation.en: At one meter in and then over at three.
translation.ja: １メートルと３メートル地点

translation.en: [Dennis] Each stake represents a probable body.
translation.ja: 棒は遺体がある可能性を示す

translation.en: This is essentially a mass grave.
translation.ja: つまりここは集団墓地

translation.en: A hundred years ago, a deadly influenza virus
translation.ja: 100年前 致命的な インフルエンザウイルスに―

translation.en: infected hundreds of millions of people around the world.
translation.ja: 100年前 致命的な インフルエンザウイルスに― 世界中の数億人が感染した

translation.en: It overwhelmed hospitals.
translation.ja: 病院が溢(あふ)れ―

translation.en: It overwhelmed mortuaries.
translation.ja: 霊安室が溢(あふ)れ返った

translation.en: So towns all over the world needed a quick solution.
translation.ja: 世界中の町が 早い解決策を求めた

translation.en: We could be standing in any number of towns
translation.ja: 米国 ケニア インドやベトナム

translation.en: across the US, or Kenya, India, Vietnam.
translation.ja: これらの国のあらゆる町に 存在する―

translation.en: This grave site is a reminder of the devastation a flu pandemic can wreak.
translation.ja: この墓地は インフルエンザ パンデミックの惨事を物語る

translation.en: This kind of carnage is not relegated to history.
translation.ja: 歴史に葬(ほうむ)られたわけではない

translation.en: When we talk about another flu pandemic happening,
translation.ja: 次のパンデミックは―

translation.en: it's not a matter of if, but when.
translation.ja: いつ起こるかわからない

translation.en: -[helicopter hovering] -[sirens blaring]
translation.ja: 第１章 救急車だけでは不十分

translation.en: -[man] Take the stethoscope, and... -[Syra] Yes, ensure that the gown covers.
translation.ja: 聴診器を… 防護服(ガウン)を着て

translation.en: We have received reports of an outbreak of respiratory illness.
translation.ja: 呼吸器疾患の 爆発的流行(アウトブレイク)の報告

translation.en: Make sure you have a good seal. Give me a thumbs up once you know you have a good seal.
translation.ja: 隙間のないように

translation.en: About eight other countries around the world are also reporting similar outbreaks.
translation.ja: 他８カ国も同様の流行を報告

translation.en: -[woman] I can't breathe. -[man speaking indistinctly]
translation.ja: 息ができない

translation.en: [Syra] Unofficial case count is about over 220 with eight deaths.
translation.ja: 未確認ですが患者数は220人 ８人死亡

translation.en: We don't know what the case definition looks like
translation.ja: 疾患の詳細は不明

translation.en: and we don't know the laboratory analysis of this particular outbreak.
translation.ja: 研究所の分析結果も不明

translation.en: We know that we are dealing with something novel, we just don't know exactly what we're dealing with,
translation.ja: これは未知との戦いです

translation.en: but some of the patients are not testing positive for these normal seasonal flu viruses.
translation.ja: 季節性インフルエンザに 陽性を示さない患者もいる

translation.en: [coughs] I don't feel okay.
translation.ja: 気分が悪いわ

translation.en: [Syra] Currently, the Emergency Department at Kings County Hospital is operating at 104%
translation.ja: キングス病院の救急科の 稼働率は104％

translation.en: and so we have set up a mobile satellite emergency department.
translation.ja: 仮設の救急科を設置しました

translation.en: [doctor] What's going on?
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: -I'm not doing well. I can't breathe. -[doctor] Okay. Okay.
translation.ja: 息ができない

translation.en: [Syra] I need intubation equipment. There's no intubation equipment.
translation.ja: 挿管(そうかん)器具がない

translation.en: [Syra] Somebody get the ice. Ashley.
translation.ja: 氷を！

translation.en: I wouldn't turn it off at this point, I don't think we have time.
translation.ja: オフにしないで　時間がない

translation.en: Can you check the X-ray on bed one?
translation.ja: レントゲンの確認を

translation.en: [woman] The simulation is ended. Let's go back to the debriefing room. -Thank you. -[man] Thank you.
translation.ja: シミュレーション終了 部屋に戻りましょう

translation.en: [Syra] So all who participated, please come to make a circle.
translation.ja: インフルエンザ対策の シミュレーション調査 インフルエンザ対策の シミュレーション調査 参加者全員 輪になって下さい 参加者全員 輪になって下さい

translation.en: I think one of the things that we tried to bake into the simulation was just healthcare worker safety.
translation.ja: 今回取り入れたのは 医療従事者の安全性

translation.en: I think that was one of the biggest takeaways in the previous outbreaks.
translation.ja: 過去から学んだ重要なこと

translation.en: [woman] If I have to take the time out to switch my gown and someone needs to be intubated,
translation.ja: 防護服(ガウン)の着替え中に 挿管が必要になったら

translation.en: I'm gonna pick their life over switching out my garment.
translation.ja: 着替えより命を優先するわ

translation.en: We're talking about a severe respiratory disease.
translation.ja: 重い呼吸器疾患

translation.en: Really big lesson learned, and we mentioned this over and over,
translation.ja: 何度も話してること

translation.en: is that healthcare workers were disproportionally affected in MERS and SARS,
translation.ja: 医療従事者の多くが MARSやSARSに晒(さら)され

translation.en: and it shows us where we need to improve on.
translation.ja: 課題点が見えてきた

translation.en: So if you're not protected, if you can't protect yourself, then how are you gonna help others?
translation.ja: 自分自身を守れなければ 他人を助けられない

translation.en: [Syra] My job is to contain the virus here in New York City.
translation.ja: 私の仕事は 感染を市内にとどめること

translation.en: What worries me is that it just takes one person to start an outbreak.
translation.ja: 爆発的流行(アウトブレイク)は１人から始まる

translation.en: We're basically human incubators, we can host a number of different diseases.
translation.ja: 体の中には 数々の病原菌が宿り―

translation.en: It's just a matter of time where the next pandemic is going to start,
translation.ja: パンデミックは いつでも起こりうる

translation.en: we just don't know where or how, but we know it will.
translation.ja: どのようにかはわからない

translation.en: I remember, at a very young age, watching a movie called Outbreak,
translation.ja: 幼い頃見た映画 「アウトブレイク」

translation.en: and in this movie you had a novel virus
translation.ja: 新型ウイルスが― カリフォルニアから 瞬く間に広まった

translation.en: that started in California that quickly spread.
translation.ja: カリフォルニアから 瞬く間に広まった

translation.en: Healthcare workers get suited up, and I was like, "Oh, my God,
translation.ja: 防護服姿の人々を見て 緊張感のある仕事に 憧れた

translation.en: working in that high-risk environment, this is amazing."
translation.ja: 緊張感のある仕事に 憧れた

translation.en: That was a formative moment for me, and I have been pursuing a career in infectious disease preparedness ever since.
translation.ja: それがきっかけで 感染症対策の仕事を志(こころざ)した

translation.en: In even a small outbreak, you have what we call "hoarding."
translation.ja: 小規模の流行でも 買いだめ問題があります

translation.en: We saw this in the H1N1 outbreak where vaccines were not made available in the United States
translation.ja: Ｈ１Ｎ１の流行時 他国がワクチンを買いだめし

translation.en: in a timely fashion because countries were hoarding it...
translation.ja: 米国の入手が遅れました

translation.en: You know, these infectious disease outbreaks are scarier and more deadly than conventional warfare.
translation.ja: 感染症の発生は 戦争より致命的で脅威になる

translation.en: So this is something that people should pay attention to, but they forget in their day-to-day lives.
translation.ja: 日々忘れがちでも 注目すべきだと忠告する

translation.en: My job is to remind them.
translation.ja: それが私の仕事

translation.en: Hello.
translation.ja: もしもし

translation.en: Okay. Knocked out, okay.
translation.ja: ええ…わかった

translation.en: Okay, I'll be there in a second. Okay.
translation.ja: すぐ行くわ

translation.en: Yeah, I can hear it, too.
translation.ja: 聞こえた

translation.en: [Holly] I wake up in this building. I eat in this building.
translation.ja: この病院で起きて食事して

translation.en: I put my pajamas on in this building and I sleep in this building.
translation.ja: ここでパジャマを着て寝る

translation.en: [Juanita] How did I know you'd be the one to make my night?
translation.ja: 72時間勤務の24時間目 72時間勤務の24時間目 来てくれると思ったわ 72時間勤務の24時間目

translation.en: I'm telling you.
translation.ja: 72時間勤務の24時間目 言ったでしょ

translation.en: [Holly] Juanita.
translation.ja: 言ったでしょ

translation.en: When I came out of medical school...
translation.ja: 医学部を卒業した時

translation.en: in the back of my mind I still had that vision of what it was to be a small-town doctor.
translation.ja: 小さい町の医師の イメージがあった

translation.en: Very old-school, the one doctor in town.
translation.ja: 昔ながらの 町で１人だけの医師

translation.en: I want you to hold your breath. Big deep breath in and hold it.
translation.ja: 深呼吸して 息をとめて

translation.en: They saw patients in the clinic,
translation.ja: 外来も救急も担当して

translation.en: they were the ones that were rotating through the ER.
translation.ja: 外来も救急も担当して 入院患者を診て 赤ちゃんも取り上げる

translation.en: They were the ones seeing the patients in the hospital and delivering babies.
translation.ja: 入院患者を診て 赤ちゃんも取り上げる

translation.en: I wanted to be that guy. I wanted to be that one
translation.ja: そんな医師になりたかった

translation.en: who took care of the patient when they were well and took care of the patient when they were sick.
translation.ja: 患者さんが元気な時も 病気の時もケアする

translation.en: -Stick it out and say, "Ah." -Ah.
translation.ja: 舌を出して

translation.en: [Holly] And took care of the patient when they were hurt
translation.ja: 怪我の治療をして

translation.en: and ran into the patient in different social situations outside of the hospital or clinic.
translation.ja: 病院の外でも 患者さんとばったり会ったり

translation.en: You okay? -I need to see what's under there. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 大丈夫？　どれどれ

translation.en: [Holly] I had other physicians that talked to me and I'd say, "What advice do you have for me?"
translation.ja: 他の医師にアドバイスを 聞いたら―

translation.en: And they'd say, "Reconsider."
translation.ja: “考え直せ”と

translation.en: But nobody could dissuade me. I was gonna do it regardless.
translation.ja: でも私の決意は固かった

translation.en: Hi, there. -So were you diagnosed with the flu? -[woman] Yeah. [Holly] They swabbed you?
translation.ja: こんにちは インフルエンザ陽性ね？

translation.en: -It was positive? -[woman] Yes.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: -Do you remember if it was the A or the B? -[woman] I think it was the A.
translation.ja: ＡかＢか覚えてる？

translation.en: -[Holly] A, okay. -They did both of our noses.
translation.ja: Ａだと思う　水曜に検査した

translation.en: -That was Wednesday. -[Holly] You should be at the end of it, but you're not feeling better--
translation.ja: でも回復しないのね

translation.en: [woman] Yesterday, my symptoms started getting worse.
translation.ja: 昨日から悪化してる

translation.en: [Holly] Okay. Have you been feeling sweats, chills?
translation.ja: 汗や悪寒は？

translation.en: [woman] Chills. He wakes up in a sweat.
translation.ja: 悪寒　彼は汗で目を覚ます

translation.en: [Holly] She said that you have not been feeling well at all. That you really haven't been getting over the flu like you ought to.
translation.ja: インフルエンザが回復せず 気分が悪いのね

translation.en: Big deep breath in. Well done. Good. Do that again.
translation.ja: 深呼吸して　もう１回

translation.en: I don't have every resource that a large hospital has.
translation.ja: 大きな病院ほどの資源はない

translation.en: I honestly have no idea what I would do in a situation like a pandemic.
translation.ja: パンデミックが起きたら どうするかわからない

translation.en: We're gonna be lower on the totem pole in terms of getting replenishment of our resources.
translation.ja: 資源供給の優先順位が 低い病院だから

translation.en: Places that have higher populations are gonna be the places that get that lifesaving medication first.
translation.ja: 先に人口の多い場所に 命を救える薬が届く

translation.en: I think that we would be overwhelmed. We wouldn't be able to manage
translation.ja: この小さな町に パンデミックが起きたら―

translation.en: should a flu pandemic occur in our little county.
translation.ja: この小さな町に パンデミックが起きたら― 手に負えないと思う

translation.en: [Dennis] We have to follow the virus. Where is the virus located?
translation.ja: ウイルスの場所を 突き止めないと

translation.en: Very good.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: And the virus is located in birds.
translation.ja: ウイルスの居場所は 鳥

translation.en: My job takes me all over the world.
translation.ja: 仕事で世界中に行く

translation.en: My main responsibility is trying to prevent, trying to detect,
translation.ja: 私の責任は ウイルスの脅威に対し―

translation.en: and respond, and control emerging viral threats.
translation.ja: 対策と検出 対応と制御すること 対策と検出 対応と制御すること デニス·キャロル氏 合衆国 国際開発庁 新脅威対策課

translation.en: There is no single, more dangerous influenza virus
translation.ja: 今世界で最も危険な インフルエンザウイルスは―

translation.en: circulating in this planet today than the avian flu in China right now.
translation.ja: 今世界で最も危険な インフルエンザウイルスは― 中国の鳥インフルエンザ

translation.en: 60% of the people who are infected die.
translation.ja: 感染者の60％が死亡する

translation.en: [newscaster 1] Chinese and global health authorities
translation.ja: ２０１３年　中国 中国や各国の保健当局は 中国や各国の保健当局は 新型鳥インフルエンザ Ｈ７Ｎ９に注目

translation.en: are watching a new strain of bird flu. It's called H7N9.
translation.ja: 新型鳥インフルエンザ Ｈ７Ｎ９に注目

translation.en: This is definitely one of the most lethal influenza viruses that we have seen so far.
translation.ja: 致死率が非常に高い インフルエンザウイルス

translation.en: [newscaster 1] Authorities in China are at pains to say they're on top of this potential outbreak.
translation.ja: 中国当局は流行対策に苦戦

translation.en: [newscaster 2] At least 108 cases, 22 of those people infected died.
translation.ja: 少なくとも108人が感染 うち42人が死亡

translation.en: The recent H7N9 virus has a very high mortality rate.
translation.ja: Ｈ７Ｎ９ウイルスは 死亡率が非常に高い

translation.en: That said, it remains an inefficient virus for infecting people.
translation.ja: しかし人間へは感染しにくい

translation.en: So far, this virus has not yet spread beyond China,
translation.ja: 今のところ中国の外には 広まっていないが

translation.en: but it could happen at any time.
translation.ja: いつでも起こりうる

translation.en: -When were these birds last vaccinated? -[woman] Seven days ago.
translation.ja: いつワクチンを打った？ ７日前

translation.en: [Dennis] So they had a problem with neighboring farms having outbreaks?
translation.ja: 近隣農家で感染流行が？

translation.en: [in Vietnamese] Yes, they did.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: Some people bought sick chickens at the market.
translation.ja: 誰かが市場で 病気の鳥を買った

translation.en: [Dennis in English] There are almost endless variations of the influenza virus.
translation.ja: インフルエンザウイルスの 種類は無数にあり

translation.en: They're denoted by different combinations of H's and N's, such as H5N1.
translation.ja: Ｈ５Ｎ１など 様々な ＨとＮの組み合わせがある

translation.en: The H's and N's ultimately define
translation.ja: ＨやＮは ウイルスの物理的な特徴や―

translation.en: the physical characteristics an influenza virus will have
translation.ja: ＨやＮは ウイルスの物理的な特徴や― 感染がどれだけ致命的か示す

translation.en: and just how deadly that infection might be.
translation.ja: 感染がどれだけ致命的か示す

translation.en: The pandemic flus and the seasonal flus are profoundly different.
translation.ja: パンデミックと季節性の インフルエンザは大きく違う

translation.en: A pandemic influenza will likely come from an animal
translation.ja: パンデミックの インフルエンザは動物から―

translation.en: and it will be a new and novel, never-seen-before virus.
translation.ja: 前代未聞の新型ウイルス

translation.en: When a novel virus emerges from animals, we will not have natural immunity.
translation.ja: 動物から来る新型ウイルスに 我々は免疫がない

translation.en: Our systems will have no means to fight the infection off,
translation.ja: 自然の免疫力では 感染と闘えず―

translation.en: which means it has the potential for being very deadly.
translation.ja: 致命的になる可能性がある

translation.en: That's why there are researchers around the world committed to developing a universal vaccine
translation.ja: だから世界中の研究者が 万能ワクチンを開発する

translation.en: that will be effective against any and all influenza viruses.
translation.ja: あらゆるインフルエンザ ウイルスに効くワクチン

translation.en: [Jake] I don't really get stage fright anymore.
translation.ja: もう舞台で緊張しない

translation.en: I used to do this thing where if I knew I was about to go on the stage, my heart would start beating and I'd feel like I was gonna pass out,
translation.ja: 以前は舞台に上がる前 緊張で倒れそうだった

translation.en: but I knew for the work that I wanted to do, I had to be an effective communicator.
translation.ja: でもこの仕事では 伝えることが大事

translation.en: If I wasn't able to communicate my science, then it was almost like the science didn't exist.
translation.ja: 自分の研究を伝えなければ 意味がない

translation.en: Can you get the slides up?
translation.ja: ジェイク·グランヴィル氏は 世界初の万能ワクチンを 開発中 ジェイク·グランヴィル氏は 世界初の万能ワクチンを 開発中 スライドを

translation.en: That's a different slide there.
translation.ja: ジェイク·グランヴィル氏は 世界初の万能ワクチンを 開発中 違うスライドだ

translation.en: All right, good afternoon, New York.
translation.ja: こんにちは こんにちは 治療開発学会

translation.en: So, yeah, I'm the co-founder, Chief Science Officer,
translation.ja: 私は― ディストリビューテッド· バイオの会長です

translation.en: and the Chairman of Distributed Bio,
translation.ja: ディストリビューテッド· バイオの会長です

translation.en: and this afternoon I'm gonna share with you
translation.ja: 今日お話ししたいことは

translation.en: the story of a slow-burning revolution in biologic therapeutic discovery.
translation.ja: 生物学的な 治療開発の進化の物語

translation.en: I never memorize a specific speech. I think about the arc of the story I'm gonna tell,
translation.ja: スピーチは暗記せず 物語の筋を思い描いて

translation.en: and really good storytelling, those rules apply to science.
translation.ja: 良い語り方を心がける これは科学も同じ

translation.en: It's basically the same rules that our ancestors did around the campfire, right?
translation.ja: キャンプでする物語と同じ

translation.en: First you have to introduce the terrible monster.
translation.ja: キャンプでする物語と同じ まず怖い怪物の話をする

translation.en: In this case, it's influenza.
translation.ja: まず怖い怪物の話をする

translation.en: The problem is that the virus mutates so quickly that your immune response becomes obsolete by the next year.
translation.ja: ウイルスの変異が早く 翌年 免疫が効かない

translation.en: We have created these amazing vaccine technologies
translation.ja: ワクチン技術は―

translation.en: that are arguably the greatest advances since sanitation and fire,
translation.ja: 公衆衛生と 火の発見以来の進歩

translation.en: and yet they don't work on rapidly mutating viruses, like the flu, for instance.
translation.ja: でも変異が早い インフルエンザには効かない

translation.en: And for a while we thought we were just stuck with this.
translation.ja: 行き止まりかと思いました

translation.en: They're never really gonna be able to solve the problem
translation.ja: 行き止まりかと思いました １本の注射でインフルエンザ 予防はできないと

translation.en: of having a good single shot that's gonna solve our risk of being exposed to flu.
translation.ja: １本の注射でインフルエンザ 予防はできないと

translation.en: Then you present the hero.
translation.ja: そこでヒーロー登場

translation.en: That there's some new technology that exists, that could potentially create a breakthrough.
translation.ja: 画期的な技術が存在する

translation.en: We're making a vaccine that could treat all future versions of flu.
translation.ja: どんなインフルエンザにも 効くワクチン

translation.en: So, fundamentally, our approach was different, because we tested against future and past strains.
translation.ja: 我々は新たなアプローチで 過去と未来の種類に試した

translation.en: Under some circumstances, some people end up producing these nice antibodies
translation.ja: 特定の人々は 多くの種類の―

translation.en: that hit all the strains or many of the strains of flu,
translation.ja: 特定の人々は 多くの種類の― インフルエンザへの 抗体を作ります

translation.en: and they enjoy broad protection.
translation.ja: インフルエンザへの 抗体を作ります

translation.en: You all might have those friends, right?
translation.ja: 友人にもいるでしょう

translation.en: It's that annoying hippie friend of yours who's like,
translation.ja: 友人にもいるでしょう ワクチン打たなくても 元気なタイプ

translation.en: "I never take the flu shot and I'm fine." Right? -Some of them may be right. [chuckles] -[crowd chuckles]
translation.ja: ワクチン打たなくても 元気なタイプ

translation.en: [Jake] But why the hell aren't we all protected all the time?
translation.ja: なぜ我々全員 そうじゃないのか

translation.en: Our approach was able to neutralize viruses all the way back to 1934
translation.ja: 我々は 1934年から 未来のウイルスまでの―

translation.en: as well as protect against future viral variants.
translation.ja: 中和に成功しました

translation.en: [Sarah] I met Jake Glanville in the fall of 2014.
translation.ja: ジェイクとは 2014年の秋に知り合って

translation.en: He offered me a job.
translation.ja: 仕事をオファーされた

translation.en: He knew that I had skills that he would need
translation.ja: サンフランシスコ サンフランシスコ 私には 彼のプログラムに 必要なスキルがあった

translation.en: if he wanted to launch this vaccine program.
translation.ja: 私には 彼のプログラムに 必要なスキルがあった サラ·イーヴス 万能ワクチン開発を 率いる主任研究員

translation.en: Okay, so I can add the antibody to this one, then?
translation.ja: これに抗体を加えていい？

translation.en: [Sarah] Jake just thinks outside the box.
translation.ja: ジェイクは型破りな発想

translation.en: He thinks of these crazy ideas that are completely out of the norm.
translation.ja: 常識を超える アイデアを思いつく

translation.en: Okay, the NHS and EHC are added, so clock's ticking now.
translation.ja: ＮＨＳとＥＨＣを加えた あとは時間が経つのを待つわ

translation.en: We've done multiple animal studies so we know that this is reproducible. What we're seeing is real.
translation.ja: 数々の動物実験をしたから これは再現可能

translation.en: I want to prove that my research and Jake's research could change the world.
translation.ja: 我々の研究は 世界を 変えられると証明したい

translation.en: This vaccine could eradicate influenza as we know it.
translation.ja: インフルエンザを 撲滅できるかもしれない

translation.en: This will not work at all.
translation.ja: 全然効かない

translation.en: [man in Hindi] Sir, this one is expected H1N1.
translation.ja: おそらくＨ１Ｎ１

translation.en: So fast?
translation.ja: こんなに早く？

translation.en: [newscaster in English] There has been an alarming rise in the swine flu or H1N1 cases in India this year.
translation.ja: 今年インドでは Ｈ１Ｎ１患者数が急増

translation.en: The situation is turning rather serious with the fatalities increasing by the day.
translation.ja: 日々死亡者が増え 深刻な状況です

translation.en: The North Indian State of Rajasthan has been worst hit by the H1N1 virus.
translation.ja: 最も深刻な場所は 北インドのラージャスターン

translation.en: -[man in Hindi] Negative. It's negative. -[Dinesh] But, look.
translation.ja: 陰性だ

translation.en: The shadow is still here.
translation.ja: 陰性だ でも影がある　明るい箇所も

translation.en: And there are some light ones here.
translation.ja: でも影がある　明るい箇所も

translation.en: Let us see how you feel without oxygen.
translation.ja: 酸素を外してみよう

translation.en: [woman] Should we continue with Tamiflu?
translation.ja: タミフル続ける？

translation.en: [Dinesh] It's day six today, right? Give it for one more day.
translation.ja: ６日目だね？　あと１日

translation.en: [woman in English] Tamiflu, stop after seven days.
translation.ja: ７日目までタミフル

translation.en: [in Hindi] We will stop it tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日まで

translation.en: [Dinesh in English] Swine flu is a very rapidly progressing disease. Very rapidly.
translation.ja: 豚インフルエンザは 進行が非常に早い

translation.en: In just a few days, it can affect both of the lungs, and it is a life-threatening disease.
translation.ja: ほんの数日で肺が侵され 命に関わる病気だ

translation.en: Common flu. All patients came with throat pain, sneezing, fever, body ache.
translation.ja: 喉や関節痛 熱やくしゃみは 一般的なインフルエンザ

translation.en: But a patient who has nausea, vomiting, along with breathlessness,
translation.ja: でも吐き気や嘔吐 息切れがあり―

translation.en: and he says "troublesome cough,"
translation.ja: “厄介な咳(せき)”と言ったら

translation.en: always think "swine flu." Always think swine flu.
translation.ja: 必ず 豚インフルエンザを疑うべき

translation.en: [Dinesh in Hindi] Breathe normally.
translation.ja: 普通に呼吸して

translation.en: [in English] If it's not diagnosed properly at an early stage, it is difficult to treat.
translation.ja: 早期に診断できなければ 治療が難しい

translation.en: [Dinesh in Hindi] The problem is, when she came here, she had 60%-70% saturation.
translation.ja: ここに来た時点で 60〜70%進行していた

translation.en: If she had been on the road, she would've died.
translation.ja: 来なければ死んでいた

translation.en: That is the fact.
translation.ja: それが事実

translation.en: [in English] We will shift to the ICU. Then treatment will start.
translation.ja: ＩＣＵで治療を始める

translation.en: [in Hindi] The later they come, the more laborious it gets to breathe,
translation.ja: 治療が遅れるほど 呼吸が苦しくなり

translation.en: and it becomes a matter of life or death.
translation.ja: 命の危険が迫る

translation.en: [Dennis] Biggest challenge with flu
translation.ja: 最大の課題

translation.en: is not being lulled into acceptance of seasonal flu
translation.ja: 季節性インフルエンザ だけが脅威だと―

translation.en: as all we have to worry about.
translation.ja: 思い込んではいけない

translation.en: Because every once in a while, there is a variant of flu that emerges
translation.ja: 周期的に 人類の存在を脅(おびや)かす―

translation.en: that poses an existential threat to us as a species.
translation.ja: 新型のインフルエンザが 発生するからだ

translation.en: We go back to 1918...
and, you know, that flu profoundly impacted this Earth.
translation.ja: そんなインフルエンザが 世界を襲った

translation.en: It emerged at the very end of World War I.
translation.ja: 第一次世界大戦の終わり

translation.en: Soldiers returning home from battle helped spread the virus around the world.
translation.ja: 戦場から戻る兵士が 世界中に感染を広めた

translation.en: We ended up seeing a global event very rapidly,
translation.ja: 急速に世界中を驚愕させた

translation.en: even at a time when population movements were a fraction of what they are today.
translation.ja: 今と比べると 人口の移動は わずかだった時代

translation.en: Far more people died in the 18-month period of that flu
translation.ja: 18ヶ月間の インフル死者数は― ２つの世界大戦の 死者数より遥(はる)かに多い

translation.en: than died in all of World War I and World War II.
translation.ja: ２つの世界大戦の 死者数より遥(はる)かに多い

translation.en: Somewhere in the order of 50 to 100 million deaths.
translation.ja: その数は およそ5000万から１億人

translation.en: In 1918, there were 1.8 billion people on the planet Earth.
translation.ja: 1918年の世界人口は18億人

translation.en: Today, there are 7.8 billion people.
translation.ja: 今では78億人

translation.en: If a similar virus emerged today, the result would be not 50 to 100,
translation.ja: もし今の時代に 同様のウイルスが発生すれば 死者数は数億人になるだろう

translation.en: but hundreds of millions of people that would likely die.
translation.ja: 死者数は数億人になるだろう

translation.en: And it's a guarantee that another version
translation.ja: 新たな 恐怖(キラー)のインフルエンザは―

translation.en: of that killer flu will reappear.
translation.ja: 必ずまた現れるだろう

translation.en: We don't know when, but we should always presume it can be... soon.
translation.ja: いつかはわからないが すぐだと思っておくべき

translation.en: When it comes to a pandemic, there are many unknowns.
translation.ja: パンデミックは未知が多い

translation.en: It's about the societal disruption.
translation.ja: 社会が混乱する

translation.en: The thing that will immediately be threatened is continuity of health services.
translation.ja: すぐに 医療サービスの 継続が脅(おびや)かされる

translation.en: But also, you'll have severe issues with normal infrastructure operating.
translation.ja: 通常のインフラ基盤に 深刻な問題が起きる

translation.en: Electricity is dependent on power plants
translation.ja: 電力は発電所から来る

translation.en: and power plants are dependent on a work force.
translation.ja: 発電所の作業員が 病気になれば

translation.en: That work force becomes ill, then you have huge vulnerabilities.
translation.ja: 発電所の作業員が 病気になれば 大きな問題になる

translation.en: What are urban areas going to do after a couple of weeks of disruptive impact on food supplies?
translation.ja: 都心部で２週間 食料供給が止まったら？

translation.en: You'll not only have people dying from an influenza virus,
translation.ja: インフルエンザだけでなく

translation.en: they'll be dying from what are preventable deaths today.
translation.ja: 予防できることが原因で 死に至る

translation.en: It will leave its mark.
translation.ja: 大きな被害が残る

translation.en: That's why I do what I do.
translation.ja: それを防ぐのが私の仕事

translation.en: If we catch it early enough, we may be able to save millions of lives.
translation.ja: それを防ぐのが私の仕事 早期発見で多くの命が救える

translation.en: But it's an uphill battle
translation.ja: 辛い闘いだ

translation.en: because there are so many opportunities for emergence, and our resources for early detection are limited.
translation.ja: 発生の機会は多く 早期発見の手段は限られる

translation.en: [Syra] All right, good morning, everybody. We'll go ahead and get started with roll call.
translation.ja: おはようございます まずは電話から

translation.en: As always, one person from each facility can just state that they are on.
translation.ja: おはようございます まずは電話から ニューヨーク 各施設から１人ずつ

translation.en: We started this weekly system-wide seasonal flu activation call with all hospitals that we have across the system,
translation.ja: システム内の病院を連携し 毎週電話会議を始めた

translation.en: and the whole purpose of it is really, as we progress with seasonal flu, they let us know any impact that they're having.
translation.ja: 季節性インフルエンザの 近況報告が目的

translation.en: Influenza activity is categorized as widespread.
translation.ja: 今週 今年初めての―

translation.en: This is the actual first week that widespread activity has been reported.
translation.ja: インフルエンザ広範囲流行の 報告がありました

translation.en: Last year's flu season was one of the worst that we've had in decades.
translation.ja: 去年はここ数十年で 最大級の流行で

translation.en: A record-breaking number of hospitalizations and deaths.
translation.ja: 記録的な 入院患者と死者数が出た

translation.en: Bellevue, any changes to your current status?
translation.ja: ベルビュー　状況は？

translation.en: [man 1] No changes from the current status.
translation.ja: 状況に変化なし

translation.en: Great. Thank you. Coney Island, any changes?
translation.ja: どうも コニーアイランドは？

translation.en: [man 2] No changes.
translation.ja: 変化なし

translation.en: [Syra] Great. Thank you.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: We started seeing impacts to staffing. We started seeing impacts to flu supplies.
translation.ja: スタッフや供給に影響が出た

translation.en: There were shortages of Tamiflu,
translation.ja: タミフルが不足し 入手できない患者が―

translation.en: so much so that folks were coming back to the emergency department
translation.ja: タミフルが不足し 入手できない患者が― 子供を入院させたいと 救急に戻ってきた

translation.en: asking for their children to be admitted, because they couldn't get this medication.
translation.ja: 子供を入院させたいと 救急に戻ってきた

translation.en: -Queens, any changes? -[man 3] No changes.
translation.ja: クイーンズは？ 変化なし

translation.en: [Syra] Thank you.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: So we activated an emergency operation center to really get a bird's-eye view of what's happening system-wide
translation.ja: 状況を幅広く把握し 必要な 情報や資源を提供するため

translation.en: and where we can provide the resources and expertise that's needed.
translation.ja: 緊急センターを開設した

translation.en: And Woodhull, any changes?
translation.ja: ウッドハル？

translation.en: [woman] Yes. We have four patients on droplet precautions as of Monday and seven positive flu tests.
translation.ja: 月曜から４人飛沫(ひまつ)予防中 ７人が検査陽性

translation.en: [Syra] All right. Excellent. Well, thank you all so much for joining. We appreciate it and we will see you next week.
translation.ja: ありがとうございました ではまた来週

translation.en: Take care, everybody.
translation.ja: ありがとうございました ではまた来週 緊急対策は 施設だけでなく 世界中と繋がること

translation.en: Part of emergency management is, you know, you're not just at the facilities, but just for me also worldwide.
translation.ja: 緊急対策は 施設だけでなく 世界中と繋がること

translation.en: Sometimes when I wake up in the morning and I see 20 different emails, not just internally but also externally,
translation.ja: 朝起きると 20通のメールが 内部や外部から来る

translation.en: I'm getting alerts of what's happening. I just try to stay on top of it.
translation.ja: 常に最新情報を知りたくて

translation.en: I'm gonna pull up her info so that...
translation.ja: 情報を調べるわ…

translation.en: On any given day, it's meetings back-to-back.
translation.ja: 毎日 会議の連続

translation.en: First, thank you all so much for meeting with us, and then obviously, for this collaboration...
translation.ja: ご協力に感謝です

translation.en: I typically start, you know, 8:30 or so...
translation.ja: 朝は８時半から…

translation.en: If this was a real world event, what are some crisis standards...
translation.ja: 実際に起きたら 緊急対策の基準は…

translation.en: ...and then go on for the duration of the day.
translation.ja: 終日ずっと続く

translation.en: You wanna call the Department of Health. They will walk you through the case definition and they will...
translation.ja: 保健省から電話で 症例基準を聞き…

translation.en: This isn't Atlanta. Anyone email back from CDC yet?
translation.ja: アトランタじゃない ＣＤＣからメールは？

translation.en: This is Syra.
translation.ja: もしもし

translation.en: A good chunk of my work is actually done at night, so it's not surprising at all if you get an email from me, like, 11:00, 12:00 at night.
translation.ja: 夜も仕事するから 深夜でもメールを送る

translation.en: -[woman] Thank you so much. -[Syra] Thank you for coming.
translation.ja: ありがとうございました

translation.en: I'm perfectly fine with it. I need to meet with these folks, I need to see what's happening.
translation.ja: 人と会って 状況を把握したいから

translation.en: The threat of special pathogens is constantly on my mind.
translation.ja: 常に特定病原体の 脅威を考える

translation.en: Things like MERS, SARS, Ebola, flu.
translation.ja: MERS SARS エボラ インフルエンザ

translation.en: While these outbreaks are happening remotely in distant areas,
translation.ja: アウトブレイクは 遠くで起きても―

translation.en: we know that they're just one flight away from coming here in the United States
translation.ja: １便のフライトで 米国に入って来れる

translation.en: and that's exactly why I do what I do.
translation.ja: だからこの仕事をしてる

translation.en: What did you have for lunch today?
translation.ja: 今日のお弁当は？

translation.en: [Hassan] It wasn't halal, but I got...
translation.ja: ハラルじゃないけど ペストのパスタ

translation.en: -pasta pesto. -Good job.
translation.ja: ハラルじゃないけど ペストのパスタ いいね

translation.en: Special pathogens don't respect any boundaries.
translation.ja: 特定病原体には境界線がない

translation.en: So I wanna make sure that I'm doing it not just for my children, but for the greater good of humanity, 'cause we wanna make sure people are safe.
translation.ja: 我が子だけでなく 人類全体の安全を守りたい

translation.en: [Jake] Back in 2012, I was working at Pfizer doing antibody engineering.
translation.ja: 2012年 ファイザー社で 抗体工学を研究していた

translation.en: I wasn't working on vaccines, but I was learning a lot
translation.ja: ワクチンではないが 抗体の標的(ターゲット)への反応を 学ぶうちに―

translation.en: about how the populations of antibodies respond to their targets.
translation.ja: 抗体の標的(ターゲット)への反応を 学ぶうちに―

translation.en: That technology really opened our eyes
translation.ja: ワクチンの効果や―

translation.en: to what was really going on when someone gets vaccinated
translation.ja: ワクチンの効果や― 抗体を利用した薬の開発に 目覚めた

translation.en: or when we're trying to engineer an antibody as a drug.
translation.ja: 抗体を利用した薬の開発に 目覚めた

translation.en: I had a BA when I was at Pfizer, and I got promoted every year,
translation.ja: 当時の学歴は学士(ＢＡ)

translation.en: so I was a principal scientist with a Bachelor's Degree.
translation.ja: 毎年昇進して 主任研究員になった

translation.en: And friends of mine were... They thought I was crazy.
translation.ja: 友人に バカげてると言われたよ

translation.en: Some of them were like, "Why are you leaving a job where normally you need a PhD, and a post doc, and eight years of experience?"
translation.ja: 博士号や経験が必要な 仕事を辞めるなんて

translation.en: But I was worried if I waited another ten years, I might start having children and then I would be too scared to make a big jump.
translation.ja: でも10年後には家庭を持って リスクが取れなくなる

translation.en: I definitely was like, "I could be messing up my career right now, but..."
translation.ja: キャリアが台無しになるかも

translation.en: I came up with this idea and I thought it was too beautiful not to try.
translation.ja: でもアイデアを 試すしかなかった

translation.en: More often than not, startups are looking for the quickest path to funding.
translation.ja: スタートアップは 早い資金集めを求める

translation.en: A lot of them have a "fake it till you make it" approach.
translation.ja: その多くは “成功するまでハッタリ”

translation.en: [newscaster 1] Well, she was a college dropout who became the youngest self-made female billionaire.
translation.ja: 彼女は大学中退で 最年少の女性億万長者に

translation.en: [newscaster 2] In 2003, then 19-year-old Elizabeth Holmes founded Theranos
translation.ja: 2003年 当時19歳の ホームズはセラノスを設立

translation.en: with the hope of using small amounts of blood to do what normally took numerous tubes.
translation.ja: 通常何本も必要なことを 一滴の血液で実現するため

translation.en: -Does it work? -Yes.
translation.ja: 可能？ はい

translation.en: -You're confident in that? -I am confident in that.
translation.ja: 自信は？ あります

translation.en: [Jake] In order to get funding, they often have to convince investors about ideas that haven't been proven out yet,
translation.ja: 資金集めのため 投資家を説得する必要がある

translation.en: and sometimes, they do not have sound science to back up their plans.
translation.ja: アイデアに 科学的な根拠がない場合も

translation.en: The company faces new investigations from the Securities and Exchange Commission
translation.ja: 証券取引委員会と 連邦検察局は―

translation.en: and a US attorney's office in California.
translation.ja: 証券取引委員会と 連邦検察局は― セラノス社を調査中です

translation.en: That's in addition to an ongoing probe by the centers for Medicare and Medicaid services.
translation.ja: メディケアとメディケイドも 調査中

translation.en: [Jake] In bio tech, you need time
translation.ja: バイオテクノロジーでは

translation.en: to cultivate your credibility and your science. on top of those plans.
translation.ja: 計画に伴(ともな)った 科学的実証に時間がかかる

translation.en: [newscaster 3] Now Elizabeth Holmes is facing some pretty serious prison time.
translation.ja: ホームズは懲役に直面

translation.en: [newscaster 4] Holmes and the company's former president were indicted yesterday on federal wire fraud charges.
translation.ja: 通信詐欺容疑で ホームズと元社長を起訴

translation.en: So, eventually, some of these companies realize
translation.ja: 次第にこれらの会社は― 話題性(ハイプ)だけでは 多額の 資金は集まらないと気づく

translation.en: that the hype that they're built on is not enough to support their quest for the almighty dollar.
translation.ja: 話題性(ハイプ)だけでは 多額の 資金は集まらないと気づく

translation.en: There are a million reasons why an experiment can fail.
translation.ja: 実験が失敗する理由は 百万とある

translation.en: Ultimately, all that matters is what the data says,
translation.ja: 最終的に大事なのはデータ

translation.en: and so far, our data is very promising.
translation.ja: 今の所 我々のデータは期待できる

translation.en: All righty.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: Our goal here is that we want to enable the world to have access to our vaccines.
translation.ja: 目標は このワクチンを 世界中に届けること

translation.en: All the world...
translation.ja: 世界中に

translation.en: including people who can't afford it.
translation.ja: 貧困層にも

translation.en: That's obviously low on the list for investors.
translation.ja: 投資家にとっては 優先順位が低い

translation.en: When you take venture capital,
translation.ja: ＶＣ投資(ベンチャーキャピタル)を受けると

translation.en: you either lose control of your company or you lose control of your vision.
translation.ja: 会社のコントロールや 目標を見失う

translation.en: Right now, we are funding this. Everything up until this point has been out of our own pockets.
translation.ja: 現時点では全て自己資金だ

translation.en: We should not have been able to beat
translation.ja: 我々より人員も資金もある―

translation.en: major pharmaceutical companies who have way more money than us
translation.ja: 我々より人員も資金もある― 大手製薬会社には 勝てないはず

translation.en: and have way more people than us.
translation.ja: 大手製薬会社には 勝てないはず

translation.en: But my experience in big pharmas is they typically move very slow and they're risk averse.
translation.ja: でも大手製薬会社は 動きが遅く リスク回避型

translation.en: And so, there actually aren't that many people as you might think working on new techniques.
translation.ja: だから新技術は 多くは開発されていない

translation.en: So that's worked to our advantage, but eventually,
translation.ja: それが我々の強み

translation.en: we are going to need to get this vaccine into human trials.
translation.ja: 人への臨床試験が必要だが

translation.en: And we are not going to be able to fund that by ourselves.
translation.ja: 自己資金ではまかなえない

translation.en: [in Hindi] Goochi, dear son... Wake up, it's seven o'clock.
translation.ja: グーチ　起きて ７時だよ

translation.en: It's been 15 years since I received my MD.
translation.ja: 医師になって15年

translation.en: But they knew that what little I studied, I did it with all my heart.

translation.en: But seems like it was something very different this time.

translation.en: [in English] Until and unless he's in ICU, he's critical.

translation.en: kidneys are not working, heart is under constant pressure.
translation.ja: 現時点で肺に感染症 腎臓機能 心臓も圧迫されてる

translation.en: So, if these three vital organs are not working...

translation.en: I mean, it's really difficult.
translation.ja: この３つの臓器が 機能しなければ… 非常に難しい

translation.en: That's why, whatever happens, I'm outside always,
translation.ja: 非常に難しい だから常にここにいて

translation.en: so he feels good about it, that there's someone who's taking care.

translation.en: I'm all alone, so I have to be here.
translation.ja: 兄弟もいないから

translation.en: He's an old kind of man, "I want to go home,
translation.ja: 父は古風なタイプで

translation.en: I want to take a walk in the garden." You know, do stuff like that.
translation.ja: “家に帰って 庭を散歩したい”と言う

translation.ja: “家に帰って 庭を散歩したい”と言う “少し休んだら やりたいことができる”

translation.en: Just relax...

translation.en: and soon you will be able to do all of those."
translation.ja: “少し休んだら やりたいことができる” そう伝えた

translation.en: As long as it takes, I will be here.

translation.en: Take if off upstairs.
translation.ja: ２階で脱いで

translation.en: -Because I got hurt. -How'd you get hurt?

translation.en: -No, at home. -[Hassan shouting indistinctly]

translation.en: Go upstairs. Just go upstairs. I'll put your clothes on upstairs.
translation.ja: ２階で着せてあげる

translation.en: Amar, what are you doing?
translation.ja: アマール　何してるの？

translation.en: I have a three-year-old and I have a five-year-old.
translation.ja: ３歳と５歳の子供がいる

translation.en: No hitting.
translation.ja: ぶたないで

translation.en: It never stops.
translation.ja: 止まらない

translation.en: There are some days that are better than others in terms of just how I can handle it.

translation.en: -What happened? What happened? -[Amar crying]

translation.en: [Syra] Why don't you build something? You guys wanna build something?
translation.ja: 何か作ろうか？

translation.en: So help me build.

translation.en: And then there's other days where I'm just super exhausted, 'cause it's just been a really long or a rough day.
translation.ja: すごく忙しくて 疲れてる日もある

translation.en: Sometimes I actually put the kids down a little earlier than I need to
translation.ja: 早めに寝かしつける日もある

translation.en: so I can just relax.

translation.en: I actually don't tell them exactly what I do

translation.en: 'cause people's fear factor kicks in first before logic.
translation.ja: 学校の友達や 他のママにも話さない 人は理屈より先に 恐怖を感じる

translation.en: If they think I had any remote kind of contact with disease,

translation.en: it's like, "Don't touch me, don't come near me."

translation.en: I do this because I have a passion for it.
translation.ja: 大きな情熱を持てる仕事

translation.en: I started to work in the field of bio defense, I did some work with FBI related to bio defense.

translation.en: My Master's thesis was on Ebola

translation.en: and then the bio threat team that I was part of in 2014
translation.ja: 修士号論文のテーマはエボラ 2014年 私がいた テキサス州 保健局のチームが―

translation.en: at the Texas Department of State Health Services,

translation.en: was the team that did diagnose the very first patient.

translation.en: [doctor] The patient admitted to this hospital has tested positive for Ebola virus
translation.ja: 入院した患者は エボラウイルス陽性でした

translation.en: and we're taking every step possible to manage this situation.

translation.en: No one thought at that time that this would ever reach the shores of the United States,

translation.en: and so, there was no active monitoring or active screening in place.

translation.en: whether this patient's coming in with Ebola virus disease or a pandemic flu,

translation.en: -[boy] I don't want any shot. -[woman] You're not getting any shots
translation.ja: 注射ヤダ 注射しない　痛くないから

translation.en: or no pinches. I promise, okay?
translation.ja: 注射しない　痛くないから

translation.en: -You have a seat and wait for Mommy... -[boy] I don't want to...
translation.ja: 座ってママを待ってて

translation.en: [Holly] By the 13th of January last year,
translation.ja: 去年の１月13日までに オクラホマでは

translation.en: we'd already had over 70 Oklahomans that had passed away from the flu.
translation.ja: 去年の１月13日までに オクラホマでは 70人以上が インフルエンザで亡くなった

translation.en: Seventy people.
translation.ja: 70人以上が インフルエンザで亡くなった

translation.en: That is a lot of folks that died from an illness that could be prevented
translation.ja: ワクチンで予防できる病気で こんなに多くが亡くなった

translation.en: with a vaccine or that could be prevented with good hand hygiene
translation.ja: ワクチンで予防できる病気で こんなに多くが亡くなった 手洗いや 早期の診察でも予防できた

translation.en: or if the patient knew to come in earlier
translation.ja: 手洗いや 早期の診察でも予防できた

translation.en: and they didn't just say, "Well, I just have the flu."
translation.ja: 手洗いや 早期の診察でも予防できた “ただの風邪”と言って

translation.en: And then they die from "just the flu." That's just tragic.
translation.ja: それで死ぬなんて 悲劇だわ

translation.en: -[woman] Stop! -[crying] I don't wanna get a shot!
translation.ja: やめて！ 注射はヤダ！

translation.en: I know. Do I look somebody that will hurt you?
translation.ja: 傷つけるように見える？

translation.en: -I really don't want a shot! -I know. I know.
translation.ja: 注射ヤダ！

translation.en: [woman 1] You ready for it, you want us to do it, momma?
translation.ja: お母さん やりますか？

translation.en: -[woman 2] Thank you, doctor. -Uh-huh.
translation.ja: ありがとうございます

translation.en: Going into the flu season this year, what I have in my mind is, "It's gonna be like last year."
translation.ja: 今年のインフルエンザも 去年と同じだと思ってた

translation.en: The CDC is calling this the worst flu outbreak in eight years
translation.ja: ここ８年で最悪の流行

translation.en: and if you've had the flu already, guess what, there's a good chance you could get it again.
translation.ja: 一度かかっても再感染 するかもしれません

translation.en: [male newscaster] Can you believe that? We are nearing record breaking numbers in the state of Oklahoma when it comes to flu-related deaths.
translation.ja: インフルエンザ死者数は 地元では記録的です

translation.en: -On that side? Okay. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: こっち側？

translation.en: [Holly] Even one death in a tiny town like ours is a pretty big deal.
translation.ja: この小さな町では １人の死者でも大問題

translation.en: Take another deep breath.
translation.ja: 深呼吸して

translation.en: I don't want to lose a patient to the flu.
translation.ja: インフルエンザで 患者を死なせたくない

translation.en: [in Hindi] Sit up, ma'am.
translation.ja: 起きて

translation.en: Are you feeling good overall?
translation.ja: 体調はどう？

translation.en: See, your oxygen requirement...
translation.ja: 昨夜は酸素を繋げた？

translation.en: -Was this connected last night? -[man] No, sir.
translation.ja: 昨夜は酸素を繋げた？ いいえ

translation.en: It wasn't connected. The ventilator was not connected all night.
translation.ja: 昨夜は酸素吸入なし

translation.en: Before, you couldn't stay without it at night.
translation.ja: 昨夜は酸素吸入なし もう以前のように 夜酸素は必要じゃない

translation.en: There was no need for it now.
translation.ja: もう以前のように 夜酸素は必要じゃない

translation.en: Oxygen was running at ten liters before, now it is at one liter.
translation.ja: もう以前のように 夜酸素は必要じゃない 前は10リットル 今は１リットル

translation.en: I don't think you have any problem breathing now.
translation.ja: もう呼吸は大丈夫でしょう

translation.en: How much less is your coughing than before?
translation.ja: 咳はどう？

translation.en: [Dinesh] Only at night, just a little, but not as much as before.
translation.ja: 今は夜だけ 前ほどひどくない

translation.en: Do you want to shift into a ward today?
translation.ja: 病棟に移動する？

translation.en: You are getting bored here all by yourself. In the ward, you will talk to others, converse with them, you will not be bored.
translation.ja: ここじゃ１人で退屈でしょう 病棟なら他の人と話せる

translation.en: We are shifting her to the ward. Now, there is no requirement of ICU.
translation.ja: 病棟に移動させよう ＩＣＵは不要になった

translation.en: If God will feel so, she will be home in one to two days.
translation.ja: １〜２日で退院できるはず

translation.en: I feel a great joy easing the suffering of others.
translation.ja: 人々の苦しみを和らげるのが 私の喜び

translation.en: If I can save a patient's life,
translation.ja: 患者の命を救えたら

translation.en: and if I bring tears of joy to their mother, that is the most priceless thing for me.
translation.ja: 彼らの母親のうれし涙 これ以上のものはない

translation.en: But these are complicated cases... [in English] When the body is not responding to any treatment.
translation.ja: だがこれは複雑な症例 体が治療に反応しない

translation.en: [in Hindi] Often, in the 15 years of my professional life... when a patient of mine did not survive...
translation.ja: この15年間で 患者が亡くなるたび…

translation.en: I have wept for them.
translation.ja: 涙を流した

translation.en: The sadness I feel when I lose a patient is more than the happiness of saving ten.
translation.ja: 患者を亡くす悲しみは 救う喜びより重い

translation.en: [in English] Hello.
translation.ja: もしもし

translation.en: [in Hindi] I never switch off my mobile for even a second in 24 hours.
translation.ja: 24時間 １秒も携帯を切らない

translation.en: [in English] Never.
translation.ja: 絶対に

translation.en: [in Hindi] Only a person who has lost a patient will understand this.
translation.ja: 患者を亡くした者にしか わからない

translation.en: Even if others don't like it, including my wife, or my kids, I don't care.
translation.ja: 妻や子供に嫌がられても 気にしない

translation.en: There is still no respite from swine flu.
translation.ja: 豚インフルエンザに 休みはない

translation.en: [newscaster 1 in English] Alarming rise in the number of swine flu cases.
translation.ja: 豚インフルエンザの 報告が急増

translation.en: Over 9,000 people have tested positive for swine flu across India
translation.ja: 豚インフルエンザの 報告が急増 インドでは９千人以上が陽性

translation.en: with 86 casualties last week.
translation.ja: うち先週86人が死亡

translation.en: The death toll has now jumped to 312.
translation.ja: 死亡者数は312人に はね上がりました

translation.en: The numbers are staggering, over 9,000 people are affected,
translation.ja: ９千人以上という感染者数

translation.en: which means that once it reaches that level again, the spread will be that much faster.
translation.ja: そのレベルに達すると さらに早く広まります

translation.en: [newscaster 2] According to the CDC, last flu season killed 180 children.
translation.ja: 昨シーズンの子供の インフル死亡者数は180人

translation.en: One of the worst flu seasons in recent memory,
translation.ja: 近年で最大級の流行でした

translation.en: this new season ushers in one big question. Are we in for a repeat?
translation.ja: 今シーズンも また同じことが？

translation.en: [newscaster 3] And everything indicates that this upcoming flu season, it's gonna be worse than usual.
translation.ja: 今シーズンは通常より ひどくなる兆候(ちょうこう)が見られます

translation.en: [Bill Gates] As we've seen various flu scares, we haven't had a super good response.
translation.ja: インフルエンザ脅威への 良い対応は見られない

translation.en: And it's pretty surprising how little preparedness there is for it.
translation.ja: 驚くべきことに 対策が少ないのだ

translation.en: Fortunately, there's some amazing people who dedicate their life to this.
translation.ja: このことに 人生を捧げる人々がいる

translation.en: Like all global problems, it's not easy to solve.
translation.ja: 簡単には解決できない

translation.en: But this is the greatest risk, and we're not ready.
translation.ja: これは最大の脅威 我々は準備不足だ
